Posts.Content: Jul 30, 2010 08:34AM Beccabrite wrote: I begin tomorrow.... can I please qualify for August?  I need the support. Diagnosed May 27, thought first would be surgery but after my PET scan found a couple of node involvement they switched gears on me, saw the oncologist first time July 12.  Was going to begin chemo immediately, but they found a gum infection during dental work... so, two weeks of antibiotics and NOW have my port in and ready to go 65 Days after diagnosis!!!! TC X 6 cycles neoadjuvant, then surgery, then radiation.
Posts.Title: August 2010...anyone starting chemo besides me?! 1WonderWoman 1WonderWoman
